AnalystsTest.Text:
3/12/2016 10:21:03 AM
Making people aware is important, but more important is to convert awareness into action. Clean India - Is attitude change more important than the movement?

making people aware is first and foremost thing  where an individual or a group of people must do in order to startup with a new change.

making people aware  is important.  because until and unless we give a better undersatanding and advantages regarding the topic, we cannot expect aqurate result out of it.

In other words we cannot get things done how we need them.

yes, I agree the more important is to convert awareness into action, but action  phase would be second. In order to the put the things into action, a proper awareness is

essential. which plays a key role. If an individual or a group has executed the awareness phase proper that ultimately  leads to a perfect action.

clean India-A new programme started in Mr modi Government, trying to get wareness among the people of india. where the government has taken up useful measure in order to

bring change in the people attitude. where Mr Modi feels that a possitive attitude in the people may give raise to great action. which help in reaching their ultimate goal.

In addition to clean india their are many other programmes launched by him for imporvement in india. where those programmes have  succesfully implemented and hopefully

expecting the better result out of it. This programme needs more awarenes in the society, especially in rural areas. After giving a better awareness in all over the india only

then we can except a better result.

Bringing awareness is not an easy task. Its differ according to the situation, place, age, gender etc. Government has comeup with various promotion in radio, telivision,

internet, as an advertisement with different targeting groups. promotions were quite attractive and impressive too. they used the graphics in order to get attension from the

children and was succesfull because of proper promotion. still its in a first stage where it take time to get success in all over the in India.
